title: Number of pet stores in Canada by region 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of stores for 12 number of Months.
The Number of stores is appeared to be the highest at Month Ontario and lowest at Month Yukon.
There is a difference of 759.0 between the maximum Month Ontario and minimum Month Yukon.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of stores for 12 number of Months.
Month Ontario has the highest Number of stores and Yukon has the lowest Number of stores.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of stores for 12 number of Months.
The maximum Number of stores 762.0 is found at Month Ontario and the minimum is found at Yukon where Month is 3.0.
Month Quebec has the second highest value for Number of stores.
The lowest value at Month Yukon is 254.0x times less than the highest value at Ontario.
Number of stores at Month Ontario is 762.0 , second place is Quebec at 469.0, and thirdly is British Columbia at 348.0.
The Number of stores has lowered over the past 12 Months.
Month Yukon, and Northwest Territories share the same value 3.0.
The average Number of stores in all 12 Months is 174.83.
Summing up the values of all Months, we get total 2098.0.
